Bug List

Member spot::get_delayed_relation_simulation (const tgba *a, std::ostream &os, int opt=-1)
Does not work for generalized automata.

Member spot::explicit_magic_search (const tgba *a, option_map o=option_map())
The name is misleading. Magic-search is the algorithm from godefroid.93.pstv, not courcoubetis.92.fmsd.
